reviews.review: Nice to play when you are stressed out and you looking to chill down , good chance to catch up and socialise with your friends.

Tato hra mi změnila život, je to zajímavá zkušenost do života :). Hodně mě baví :). Díky ní jsem mentálně zralý a připravený do života, uvědomil jsem si že na tom nejsem zas tak špatně :) ..... fakt super hra :) ..... pomoc ... :)
jó játék mit ne mondjak. nincsenek csalók semmi

Awesome, I love CS from the start.

This is a really balanced fps game with a very big skill cap, so you can always get better. There are also some fun easter eggs and with prime you can go to custom servers, which is really fun.
I highly recommend

The cooldowns applications are too bad. If you have trolls in a match and you leave the match because they dont deserve your presence, you get a cool down. that's quite unfair.
